oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Highlander Hearing editorial
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Supportive editorial from Wilford O. Cross to Chattanooga Times. Cross calls the investigation a "revival of McCarthyism." He also states that behind the investigation is a "crypto-fascist movement," also seeking to resist the Supreme Court's decision in Brown v. Board of Education, which include white councils and the Ku Klux Klan. He closes with a mention that this should frighten all who care about individual liberties, because if this investigation succeeds, all will be at stake.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Cross, Wilford O. (Wilford Oakland), 1901-1978
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Highlander Folk School (Monteagle, Tenn.); Investigations; McCarthy, Joseph, 1908-1957; Legislative bodies; Communism; Fascism; Social status; White Citizens councils; Arkansas. Office of the Attorney General; Governmental investigations; School boards
